name: Tico
description: Unique shapes of colored blocks drop from the top. Your task is to avoid letting the stacked blocks reach the top by arranging them in complete rows across the bottom.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: XP Processor: Intel Single Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 2004 GPU Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel Multi Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2010 GPU Storage: 400 MB available space
